enGB: Armor Attunement
Increases your enhancement bonus to AC by 1. While wielding a shield your enhancement bonus to AC is reduced by 1 (min 1).
Shield Attunement
Increases your enhancement bonus to shield AC by 1.
Weapon Attunement
Increases your main hand weapon's enhancement bonus by 1. While wielding a weapon in your off-hand the bonus is reduced by 1 (min 1).
Weapon Attunement (Off-Hand)
Increases your off hand weapon's enhancement bonus by 1.
Deflection
Increases your deflection bonus to AC by 1.
Toughening
Increases your enhancement bonus to natural armor by 1.
Resistance
Increases your resistance bonus on saving throws by 1.
Legendary Gift
Select a legendary gift, increasing the bonuses you get from attunement.
Legendary Prowess
Increase your enhancement bonuses to any ability score by 2 (max 6).
Legendary Shieldmaster
Gain a +5 enhancement bonus from armor attunement for both your armor and your shield.
Legendary TwinWeapons
Gain a +5 enhancement bonus for all weapons while dual wielding or using secondary natural attacks.
Legendary Armor

Select a special ability you can apply to your armor. To acquire one you must spend as many Legendary Gifts as its enhancement cost. You cannot apply enhancements to armor with a total cost of more than 5.
For example, Spell Resistance (17) has an enhancement cost of +4. To acquire Spell Resistance (17) you must select it as a Legendary Gift 4 times. You cannot apply Spell Resistance (17) to armor with Shadow, which has an enhancement of +2. This applies to enchants present on the armor already or applied through special abilities such as an Armored Battlemage's Arcane Armor.
Balanced Armor (+1)
Energy Resistance 10 (+3)

This armor protects against one type of energy (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic) and is designed with patterns depicting the element it protects against. The armor absorbs the first 10 points of energy damage per attack that the wearer would normally take (similar to the resist energy spell).
Acid Resistance 10 (+3)
This armor absorbs the first 10 points of acid energy damage per attack that the wearer would normally take.
Cold Resistance 10 (+3)
This armor absorbs the first 10 points of cold energy damage per attack that the wearer would normally take.
Electricity Resistance 10 (+3)
This armor absorbs the first 10 points of electricity energy damage per attack that the wearer would normally take.
Fire Resistance 10 (+3)
This armor absorbs the first 10 points of fire energy damage per attack that the wearer would normally take.
Sonic Resistance 10 (+3)
This armor absorbs the first 10 points of sonic energy damage per attack that the wearer would normally take.
Light Fortification (+1)
Moderate Fortification (+3)
Heavy Fortification (+5)
Invulnerability (+3)
This armor grants its wearer DR 10/magic.
Shadow Armor (+2)
Improved Shadow Armor (+4)
Greater Shadow Armor (+5)
This armor grants its wearer a +15 competence bonus to Stealth skill checks.
Spell Resistance 13 (+2)
This armor grants its wearer spell resistance 13.
Spell Resistance 16 (+3)
This armor grants its wearer spell resistance 16.
Spell Resistance 19 (+4)
This armor grants its wearer spell resistance 19.
Spell Resistance 22 (+5)
This armor grants its wearer spell resistance 22.
Legendary Shield

Select a special ability you can apply to your shield. To acquire one you must spend as many Legendary Gifts as its enhancement cost. You cannot apply enhancements to armor with a total cost of more than 5.
For example, Spell Resistance (17) has an enhancement cost of +4. To acquire Spell Resistance (17) you must select it as a Legendary Gift 4 times. You cannot apply Spell Resistance (17) to a shield with Rallying, which has an enhancement cost of +2. This applies to enchants present on the armor already or applied through special abilities such as an Armored Battlemage's Arcane Armor.
Legendary Ability
Gain a +1 inherent bonus to any ability score. You can select this up to 5 times for each ability score.
Legendary Strength
Gain a +1 inherent bonus to strength. This stacks up to a +5 bonus.
Legendary Dexterity
Gain a +1 inherent bonus to dexterity. This stacks up to a +5 bonus.
Legendary Constitution
Gain a +1 inherent bonus to constitution. This stacks up to a +5 bonus.
Legendary Intelligence
Gain a +1 inherent bonus to Intelligence. This stacks up to a +5 bonus.
Legendary Wisdom
Gain a +1 inherent bonus to Wisdom. This stacks up to a +5 bonus.
Legendary Charisma
Gain a +1 inherent bonus to Charisma. This stacks up to a +5 bonus.
Mental Prowess
Select Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma. You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to the selected stat. At level 11 the bonus increases to +4.
Select Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma. You cannot choose an ability score you have already selected. You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to the selected stat.
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to the mental ability score you have not selected.
Select a mental ability score you already have an enhancement bonus in and increase it by 2.
Supreme Intellect
You receive a +6 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.
Advanced Intellect
You receive a +4 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.
Enhanced Intellect
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to Intelligence. At level 11 the bonus increases to +4.
Transcendent Wisdom
You receive a +6 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
Sage Wisdom
You receive a +4 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
Enhanced Wisdom
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to Wisdom.
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to Wisdom. At level 11 the bonus increases to +4.
Irresistible Charm
You receive a +6 enhancement bonus to Charisma.
Impressive Charisma
You receive a +4 enhancement bonus to Charisma.
Enhanced Charisma
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to Charisma.
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to Charisma. At level 11 the bonus increases to +4.
Physical Prowess
Select Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution. You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to the selected stat. At level 12 the bonus increases to +4.
Select Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution. You cannot choose an ability score you have already selected. You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to the selected stat.
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to the physical ability score you have not selected.
Select a physical ability score you already have an enhancement bonus in and increase it by 2.
Godlike Strength
You receive a +6 enhancement bonus to Strength.
Incredible Strength
You receive a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength.
Enhanced Strength
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to Strength.
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to Strength. At level 12 the bonus increases to +4.
Masterful Dexterity
You receive a +6 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
Skillful Dexterity
You receive a +4 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
Enhanced Dexterity
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to Dexterity. At level 12 the bonus increases to +4.
Unwavering Constitution
You receive a +6 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
Sturdy Constitution
You receive a +4 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
Enhanced Constitution
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
You receive a +2 enhancement bonus to Constitution. At level 12 the bonus increases to +4.
